mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 14, 2022:
- Depart from Myrtle Beach, SC
- Flight from Myrtle Beach to Nashville, TN (F3979005) - Estimated cost: $137 per person
- Total estimated cost for flight: $548
- Self-driving from the airport to your accommodation in Nashville - Estimated duration: 26 minutes, distance: 12 miles
- Check-in at "Cozy Brooklyn Studio" (private room) - Estimated cost: $1152 for 3 nights, 4 people ($96 per person/night)
- Total estimated cost for accommodations: $1152
- Explore downtown Nashville and enjoy live music in the evening

Day 2 - March 15, 2022:
- Breakfast at Biscuit Love Gulch (Southern cuisine) - Estimated cost: $30 for 4 people
- Visit the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum (admission fees not included in budget)
- Lunch at Hattie B's Hot Chicken (Nashville style hot chicken) - Estimated cost: $25 for 4 people
- Explore Centennial Park and visit the Parthenon
- Dinner at The Southern Steak & Oyster Bar (seafood and southern cuisine) - Estimated cost: $60 for 4 people

Day 3 - March 16, 2022:
- Drive from Nashville to Memphis (self-driving or taxi options available)
   - Self-driving - Estimated duration: 3 hours 10 mins, distance: 341 km, cost: $17
   - Taxi - Estimated duration: 3 hours 10 mins, distance: 341 km, cost: $341
- Visit the National Civil Rights Museum in Memphis (admission fees not included in budget)
- Lunch at Central BBQ (Memphis style BBQ) - Estimated cost: $35 for 4 people
- Explore Beale Street and enjoy live music in the evening
- Check-in at "~*PLANT HAVEN*~ Private Room -Charming Garden Apt" (private room) - Estimated cost: $354 for 2 nights, 4 people ($88.50 per person/night)
- Total estimated cost for accommodations: $354

Day 4 - March 17, 2022:
- Breakfast at Brother Juniper's (bakery and breakfast food) - Estimated cost: $20 for 4 people
- Visit Graceland (admission fees not included in budget)
- Lunch at The Arcade Restaurant (American diner) - Estimated cost: $30 for 4 people
- Explore the Memphis Zoo or the Pink Palace Museum (admission fees not included in budget)
- Dinner at Rendezvous (Memphis style BBQ) - Estimated cost: $50 for 4 people

Day 5 - March 18, 2022:
- Drive from Memphis to Myrtle Beach (self-driving or taxi options available)
   - Self-driving - Estimated duration: 11 hours 12 mins, distance: 1,199 km, cost: $59
   - Taxi - Estimated duration: 11 hours 12 mins, distance: 1,199 km, cost: $1199
- Arrival in Myrtle Beach

Total estimated cost of the trip: $2237 for transportation and accommodations + additional costs for meals, activities, and admission fees. The group has a remaining budget of $3263 for food, activities, and any unexpected expenses during their travel.
